text: (ivvisayam veliyil paravave) appattinattilulla penkal palarum (itai ilivakak karuti) â€˜â€˜atipatiyin manaivi tannitamulla oru (atimaiyana) oru valipanait tanakku inankumpati varpuruttukiral. Katal avalai mayakki vittatu! Niccayamaka aval mikat tavarana valiyil iruppataiye nankal kankirom'' enru (ilivakap) pecalanarkal
